title: FS 1895 Mayo Cut Plug TOMMY Tom McCarthy, N300, Boston Baseball HOF, SGC Graded A
author: sbursell

posts.post_title: FS 1895 Mayo Cut Plug TOMMY Tom McCarthy, N300, Boston Baseball HOF, SGC Graded A
posts.post_content:
Price Bump:  $259 Delivered Paypal Friends & Family

Hall of Fame member Tom Tommy McCarthy from the N300 1895 Mayo Cut Plug baseball card issue.

Front of card displays a fine image of this great 19th century player.

Reverse has some back damage most likely from a scrap book removal.
